job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: <p>Title: Data Scientist</p><p>Location: Dallas, TX or Atlanta, GA (Post Covid)-remote for now</p><p>Type: Contract &amp; Fulltime</p><p><br></p><p>Job Description:</p><p><br></p><p>1. A data scientist for the ML program of AIOps, which uses the FB Prophet forecasting algorithm.</p><p>2. The staff will be involved in analysis of time series data, root cause analysis of anomaly data, maintenance and enhancement of the forecasting techniques as well.</p><p>3. As Prophet is not a typical anomaly detection model, this isn’t giving us the insightful recommendations we need to avoid/ minimize outages- so the expectation is also to be able to propose alternate / improved techniques during the course of regular implementation so that this helps to strengthen our footprint on this track</p><p><br></p><p>Interested please share your updated resume to kishore@kbs-s.com</p><p><br></p><p>Best Regards</p><p>Kishore</p><p><br></p>
